gui.introduction: GUI related settings like customizing waterfall theme, language or browser behaviour.
gui.browserautolaunch_help: Launch browser to GUI URL on server startup
gui.selectlanguage_help: Select the preferred language used for GUI
gui.waterfalltheme_help: Select color theme for waterfall display

station.introduction: Station related settings, like changing your callsign, location and general behaviour.
station.callsign_help: Enter a valid callsign (Max 7 chars, no special chars)
station.callsign_placeholder: Enter your callsign and save it
station.callsignssid_help: Set a SSID for this station
station.locator_help: Enter a grid locator (Max 6 chars; shorter will randomize)
station.respondtocq: Respond to CQ callings with a QRV reply
station.respondtocq_help: QRV reply sent with random delay

chat.introduction: Message related settings, like enabling message auto repeat and configuring ADIF log connection.

modem.introduction: Modem and Audio related settings, including starting/stopping the modem, configuring audio devices, and adjusting audio levels.
modem.serverrestart_notification: Settings in RED require a server restart!
modem.restartserver_help: Start or stop the modem. Ensure your audio and radio settings are configured first.
modem.modemport_help: Set the modem port. A server restart is required
modem.modemhost_help: set the modem host address. A server restart is required
modem.audioinputdevice_help: Select your microphone or line-in device
modem.audiooutputdevice_help: Select your speaker or line-out device
modem.rxaudiolevel_help: Adjust to set the receive audio gain
modem.txaudiolevel_help: Adjust to set the transmit audio gain
modem.maximumbandwidth_help: Select the maximum bandwidth the modem will use

web.introduction: Explorer related settings, including enabling Explorer publishingand Explorer stats publishing.
web.description: Publish information like your frequency or heard stations to https://explorer.freedata.app, so other users can see your stations status. Publishing stats is currently under development and might be broken.
web.enableexplorer_help: Share your station's status with FreeDATA web service
web.enablestats_help: Share your station's statistics with FreeDATA web service

exp.introduction: Warning: These features may be incomplete. They are for experienced users ONLY!
exp.info: Info: No features publishey for testing, yet

radio.introduction: Rig Control related settings, including selecting your rig control method and configuring specific settings.
radio.rigcontroltype_help: Choose how the software controls your radio
radio.serialpttcomport_help: Select the COM port connected to your radio for PTT control
radio.serialpttcustomcomport_help: Override the com port of your radio if its not listed above
radio.serialpttviadtr_help: Configure DTR line behavior for PTT control
radio.serialpttviarts_help: Configure RTS line behavior for PTT control
radio.tciinfo: TCI is currently broken. Re-Implementation is a work in progress
radio.tcihost_help: Enter the IP address of your TCI device
radio.tciport_help: Enter the port number for TCI communication
radio.hamlibrigctldhost_help: Enter the IP address of the rigctld server
radio.hamlibrigctldport_help: Enter the port number of the rigctld server
